column4: i have 2 gigs of ram and 2 gigs of swap space. free -m shows 2029 megs of swap is used. how can I know which program(s) is using it?
it feels just _wrong_ that my regular ubuntu use (firefox, thunderbird mostly) should result in heavy swap usage when I have 2 gigs of ram :(
I use gkrellm to see what's going on ... and htop
